original_text: After these things and these acts of faithfulness, Sennacherib king of Assyria came and invaded Judah and encamped against the fortified cities, thinking to win them for himself.
korean_text: 이 모든 충성된 일을 한 후에 앗수르 왕 산헤립이 유다에 들어와서 견고한 성읍들을 향하여 진을 치고 쳐서 점령하고자 한지라

sentences.original_text: After these things and these acts of faithfulness
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일과 이 신실한 행위 후에

sentences.original_text: and encamped against the fortified cities
thinking to win them for himself
